author: Special Correspondent
text:
A security guard acted in time to foil an attempt by a miscreant to rob a leather factory owner of Rs. 8.6 lakh after inflicting cut injuries when he was coming out of a bank after drawing the amount at Kalingarayanpalayam on Thursday morning.

The security guard Karuppuswamy confronted the offender identified as Chandrasekaran (36), of Karpagam Layout, Indra Nagar, on hearing the shouts of the factory owner Mohammed Jamal (55), and snatched the cash bag. In the meantime, the public joined in and pinned down the offender.

The Chithode police rushed to the spot on information and admitted Jamal to a private hospital and the injured offender to a government hospital. Superintendent of Police M.R. Sibi Chakravarthy invited the guard and the public who had overpowered the offender.
title: Security guard foils robbery bid
